name: PublishAzureDscPullServerConfigurations
friendlyName: Publish Azure DSC Pull Server Configurations
description: Publish DSC configurations to your Azure Automation DSC Pull Server, including required modules and compiling configurations.
author: Chris Gardner

inputs.name: SourcePath
inputs.label: Configuration Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute path of the source folder, or file on the local machine, or a UNC share. This will filter for any PS1 files within it.

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to configure before running PowerShell

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of a resource group.

inputs.name: automationAccountName
inputs.label: Automation Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the Azure Automation Account.

inputs.name: StorageAccountName
inputs.label: RM Storage Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a pre-existing ARM storage account to store DSC resources in. A container called dscmodules will be created to store them.

inputs.name: OverwriteExistingConfigurations
inputs.label: Overwrite Existing Configurations
inputs.helpMarkDown: Toggle whether existing configurations should be overwritten during deployment.
